description: Interact with the Ethereum Name Service to resolve names, check availability, and retrieve records. Simplify your blockchain interactions by leveraging ENS functionalities directly within your applications.

capabilities.name: resolve-name
capabilities.description: Resolve an ENS name to an Ethereum address

capabilities.name: reverse-lookup
capabilities.description: Get the ENS name for an Ethereum address

capabilities.name: get-text-record
capabilities.description: Get a text record for an ENS name

capabilities.name: check-availability
capabilities.description: Check if an ENS name is available for registration

capabilities.name: get-all-records
capabilities.description: Get all available information for an ENS name

capabilities.name: get-subdomains
capabilities.description: Get subdomains for an ENS name

capabilities.name: get-name-history
capabilities.description: Get the history of an ENS name

capabilities.name: get-registration-price
capabilities.description: Get the price to register an ENS name
